price: “Sila yeroo (duunee) dachii keessa fagaanne nuti uumama haaraa keessatti taanaa?” jedhan. Dhugumatti, isaan qunnamtii Rabbii isaaniitti kafaroodha.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا ضَلَلۡنَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَءِنَّا لَفِي خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدِۭۚ بَلۡ هُم بِلِقَآءِ رَبِّهِمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqālū a-idhā ḍalalnā fī al-arḍi a-innā lafī khalqin jadīdin bal hum biliqāi rabbihim kāfirūna
